item.title: Julie Andrews - My Favorite Things - Baritone Ukulele - Key of Dm, EM
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: Dm, Bbmaj7, Gm, C7, F, Bb, A7, D, G, G7, Em, Cmaj7, Am, D7, C, B7, E, A, D6
As performed by Julie Andrews in “The Sound of Music”
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/4eFEPAiSnjA
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/m/misc-movies/my-favorite-things-two/
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/the-video-ukulele-method/
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Stephanie Leavell - I Love Halloween - Baritone Ukulele - Key of Em
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of Em.
Chords Used: C, B7, Em, G
As performed by Stephanie Leavell at musicforkiddos.com.

item.title: Greenlight - Ukulele Play Along - Key of Em
item.description:
For educational use.
Greenlight by Able Heart, as performed by The Jonas Brothers. The songs has been digitally altered to lower the key 1 semitone to Em so inexperienced ukulele players can play along. The lyrics video is by Songland, and may be found here - https://youtu.be/SysuzM_KwTc.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Marshmello - One Thing Right - Key of Em
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Em.
Chords Used: Em, C, G, D
As performed by Marshmello & Kane Brown
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/fKBayPdhryM
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from motionbolt.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.

Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Naomi Scott - Speechless - Key of Em
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for CGEA ukulele. Key of Em.
Chords Used: Em, D7, C, D, G, Bsus4, B, Am, Bm7
Original performance by Naomi Scott, from the (2019) motion picture "Aladdin"
Earlier today, I had posted a version of this without the "follow the chord boxes." I'm not quite sure where they went, as I start with the ukulele version and then move to other versions. So, I have re-uploaded the video. Sorry for any inconvenience.
Do you enjoy these videos? If so, please click on the tutorial video and subscribe to the sister channel to this channel. This channel will feature only video play alongs, and the sister channel will feature all of my original content.
Tutorial Video (GCEA chords & Strumming/Finger Picking): https://youtu.be/aH4_OQ2pNiI
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The baritone ukulele chord font is from ukefarm.com.
The Motion background video is from motionbolt.com
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!

item.title: Gypsy Kings - Bamboleo - Key of Em
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Bamboleo on the ukulele by The Gypsy Kings. The chords used are Em C D7 Bb Gmaj7 Am Am7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Shallow (Doebler) - Key of Em
item.description: Play along with Bradley Cooper and Lady Gaga. Chords needed: A, Am, Bm, C, D, Em, G

item.title: Los Panchos - Bésame Mucho - Key of Em
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Besame Mucho on the ukulele by Los Panchos. The chords used are Em Am E7 B A D C7 G G+ E6.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
